meanings.definition: Causing great surprise or wonder; astonishing.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was truly amazing, leaving everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: She had an amazing talent for painting beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to open doors was quite amazing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The speed at which the car zoomed past was truly amazing, like a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The magician's tricks were so amazing that the audience couldn't believe their eyes.

meanings.sent1: The cake she baked was simply amazing, everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent2: He gave an amazing speech that inspired everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The dog's ability to balance a treat on its nose was an amazing sight.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in amazing colors, like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The new roller coaster was so amazing that people lined up for hours to ride it.
